issue.title: [CI] Update setuptools in the ubuntu images
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12178](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12178). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Our docs build is failing due to outdated setuptools version.

comments.body:
